thread.title: Germania colloca 3,225 mld Bobl a tasso medio 0,05%, bid-to-cover stabile Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 3,225 mld Bobl a tasso medio 0,05%, bid-to-cover stabile Bond |
text: March 07 (Reuters) - German Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 3.225 billion euros in a top-up of its 0.00 percent, 5-year Bobl notes at the lowest price of 99.76, the Bundesbank said on Wednesday. The notes (ISIN:DE0001141778) are due to mature on April 14, 2023. The settlement date is March 09. Results of Jan 31 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 07/03/18 31/01/18 AVG. YIELD 0.05 pct 0.08 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 99.77 99.6 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 99.76 99.6 TAIL 0.01 0 TOTAL BIDS 4.19 bln euros 4.246 bln euros ALLOTTED 3.225 bln euros 3.204 bln euros RETAINED 0.775 bln euros 0.796 bln euros BID COVER RATIO 1.3 1.3 TOTAL VOLUME 8.0 bln euros 4.0 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at ESZB/BBK03.
